Text.val: -- Author: Bujakowski Grzegorz
12.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (FCMT)
08.08.2012 GB SCR17486 Step 6: Changed calculation for Allocate bankcharges and Allocate other deductions
30.07.2012 GB SCR17475 Extended test for FCI_BUYER in the Part1/Step 3. Store FCI_MSG11 row
29.05.2012 JH SCR17269 Added update of new fields FCMH_ADMNO, FCMH_CLNTNO and FCMH_DEBH_NO
30.12.2011 GB SCR17002 Added store the FCI_MESSAGE_TEXT row after the Step 7 â€“ Final updates
06.08.2011 GB SCR16669 Changed condition of selection from ..BTPC_STATUS = 4 to
BTPC_STATUS >= 3
25.03.2011 GB SCR16316 Changed of a few conditions (see the SCR)
04.02.2011 GB SCR16194 Changed value of update the FI11_BUYER_NO,FI11_BUYER_NAME
in the Step 4. Store FI11 row for normal invoices / credit notes
19.09.2010 GB SCR15717 Rebuild of the task Sum (FI11_BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) in the
part 2 to sql and check condition for there is no FCI_BUYER row selected in the
Step 3. Store FCI_MSG11 row
19.01.2010 GB SCR15248 Fixed bug with "obtain all FCI_SELLER rows" (the Step 3)
19.10.2009 GB SCR14988 Changed calculation in the Step 6
17.03.2009 GB SCR14493 Changed condition for Step 6
25.02.2009 GB SCR14448 Extended condition for
Step 1. Check if BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT must be skipped
30.01.2009 SH SCR14355 Moved task "Is_BPIV_RowExists" before executing task
"3. StoreFCI_MSG11_Row" to achive proper update of FM11_BLOCKADVANCE
27.01.2009 SH SCR14337 Fixed mult problems with reset of help variables and
other changes see SCR for more details
23.01.2009 GB SCR14337 Added Part 2 and changed Part 1.
21.01.2009 GB SCR14289 Skip steps Allocate bankcharges,Allocate other deductions
if a FI11 row was stored in step 5
19.01.2009 GB SCR14289 Added FCMH_CURRENCY
05.01.2009 GB SCR14275 Changed set V.TOTINVCREDITNOTEAMT, set FI11_BANKCHARGEAMT
set FI11_DEDUCAMT
17.12.2008 GB SCR14247 Changed update the FM11_PMTBATCHCURRENCY =
CLNT108_ACC_CURR in 2. Store FCI_MSG11 row
12.12.2008 GB SCR14223 Removed bug in the Is_BPIV_RowExistsForStore1
03.12.2008 GB SCR14185 Extended condition where the second FI11 row is written
28.11.2008 SH SCR14166 Added FM11_BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT and changed test
BPIV_INVO_NO>0 in BPIV_INVO_SCHTNOCLI>0 (only first 2 tests)
26.11.2008 GB SCR14153 Changed update FCMH_CREATEDBY BTCH_USRIDENTERED
if <> blank else 'Factorlink'
24.11.2008 GB SCR14145 Changed tests on BPIV_INVO_SCHTNOCLI with
24.11.2008 GB SCR14145 Changed update field FI11_PMTTYPE
24.11.2008 GB SCR14133 Changed update fields FI11_PMTAMT, FI11_BANKCHARGEAMT,
21.11.2008 GB SCR14133 Added store FI1 after the store of the second FI11 row

SQL_STMT_U.val: select BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC.BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC.BTPC_LINENO, BTPC.BTPC_ADMNO, BTPC.BTPC_CLNTNO, BTPC.BTPC_DEBH, BTPC.BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC, BTPC.BTPC_DATCASHREPORT, BTPC.BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT, BTPC.BTPC_DEBC_NO from :1/CLNT CLNT, :1/BTPC BTPC where CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = BTPC.BTPC_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = BTPC.BTPC_CLNTNO and CLNT.CLNT212_FCI = 2 and BTPC.BTPC_DATCASHREPORT = ':2' and BTPC.BTPC_STATUS >= 3 and BTPC.BTPC_DEBC_NO > 0 and BTPC.BTPC_FCI_FM11_NO = 0 and BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE <> ':3' and BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE <> ':4' and BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE <> ':5' for fetch only

Text.val: -- Reset variables
-- Obtain first FCI_BUYER with FCBU_BUYER_DEBH_NO = BTPC_DEBH
-- Obtain first FCI_BUYER with FCBU_BUYER_DEBC_NO = BTPC_DEBC_NO
Step 1. Check if BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT must be skipped
-- BPIV row exists
-- If all BPIV rows are handled then update MI11 row

SQL_STMT_U.val: select FCBU_MEMBER_NO_EF, FCBU_MEMBER_NO_IF, FCBU_SELLER_NO, FCBU_BUYER_NO, FCBU_BUYER_NAME, FCBU_BUYER_DEBH_NO, FCSE_SELLER_NO, FCSE_SELLER_NAME from :1/FCBU, :1/FCSE where :2 and FCSE_SELLER_ADMNO = :3 and FCSE_SELLER_CLNTNO = :4 and FCSE_MEMBER_NO_EF = FCBU_MEMBER_NO_EF and FCSE_MEMBER_NO_IF = FCBU_MEMBER_NO_IF and Upper(FCSE_SELLER_NO) = Upper(FCBU_SELLER_NO) for fetch only

select count(*) from :1/BPIV BPIV, :1/PAYC PAYC where BPIV.BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = PAYC.PAYC_CODE and BPIV.BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV.BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and BPIV.BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = :4 and PAYC.PAYC_BLOCKFCIPAYMENT = 'Y' for fetch only

Text.val: V.TOTINVCREDITNOTEAMT = sum (FI11_BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC)
where FI11_FM11_NO = FFM11_NO and FI11_BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC > 0
Allocate bankcharges
Split the bank charge amount over all FI11 rows
Handle possible remaining amount
Allocate other deductions
Split the other deduction amount over all FI11 rows
Handle possible remaining amount
-- Normal invoices
-- 1 if BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC > 0 and no row exists in FM10
-- 2 if BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC < 0 and no row exists in FM10
-- 3 if BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC > 0 and row exists in FM10
-- 4 if BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC < 0 and row exists in FM10
-- FI09_DOCNR only if FCI_MSG09INV row is found where
FI09_INVO_NO = BPIV_INVO_NO else BPIV_INVO_INVOICENO
-- Store FI11 row for dummy "invoices" (not booked via schedules)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (FI11_BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/FI11 where FI11_FM11_NO = :2 and FI11_BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC > 0 for fetch only

select cast (sum (BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BPIV BPIV, :1/PAYC PAYC where BPIV.BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = PAYC.PAYC_CODE and BPIV.BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV.BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and BPIV.BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = :4 and BPIV.BPIV_PAYMENTCODE > 0 and BPIV.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC < 0 and PAYC.PAYC_FCI_BANKCHARGES = 'Y' for fetch only

select cast (sum (BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BPIV BPIV, :1/PAYC PAYC where BPIV.BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = PAYC.PAYC_CODE and BPIV.BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV.BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and BPIV.BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = :4 and BPIV.BPIV_PAYMENTCODE > 0 and BPIV.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC < 0 and PAYC.PAYC_FCI_OTHERDEDUCTIONS = 'Y' for fetch only
select cast (sum (FI11_BANKCHARGEAMT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/FI11 where FI11_FM11_NO = :2 for fetch only
select cast (sum (FI11_DEDUCAMT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/FI11 where FI11_FM11_NO = :2 for fetch only
select cast (sum (FI11_BANKCHARGEAMT + FI11_DEDUCAMT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/FI11 where FI11_FM11_NO = :2 for fetch only

select BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC.BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC.BTPC_LINENO, BTPC.BTPC_ADMNO, BTPC.BTPC_CLNTNO, BTPC.BTPC_DEBH, BTPC.BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC, BTPC.BTPC_DATCASHREPORT, BTPC.BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT from :1/CLNT CLNT, :1/BTPC BTPC where CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = BTPC.BTPC_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = BTPC.BTPC_CLNTNO and CLNT.CLNT212_FCI = 2 and BTPC.BTPC_DATCASHREPORT <= ':2' and BTPC.BTPC_STATUS >= 3 and BTPC.BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC < 0 and BTPC.BTPC_FCI_FM11_NO = 0 and BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE <> ':3' and BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE <> ':4' and BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE <> ':5' and exists (select * from :1/BPIV BPIV, :1/PAYC PAYC where BPIV.BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = PAYC.PAYC_CODE and BPIV.BPIV_BTCH_ID = BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_ID and BPIV.BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = BTPC.BTPC_BTCP_LINENO and BPIV.BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = BTPC.BTPC_LINENO and BPIV.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC = BTPC.BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC and PAYC.PAYC_FCI_BANKCHARGES = 'Y' ) for fetch only

Text.val: -- Reset variables
Step 1: Locate payments message which can be compensated
Step 2: Compensate costs with located payments
V.TOTCURRC = sum (FI11_BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC)
Step 3: Handle possible remaining rounding difference
-- If V.DIFFERENCE <> 0 then select one of the FI11 rows again and update
Step 4: Update FM11 rows
Step 5: Update BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (FI11_BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/FI11, :1/FM11, :1/FCMH where FM11_NO = FI11_FM11_NO and FM11_BTPC_ADMNO = :2 and FM11_BTPC_CLNTNO = :3 and FM11_CLNA_ID = 0 and FM11_FM18_NO = 0 and FCMH_NO = FM11_NO and FCMH_XMLCREATED = 'N' and FI11_BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC > 0 and FM11_TOTAMTPAID > 0 and FM11_PMTBATCHDATE <= ':4' for fetch only

Text.val: -- set V.FI11_BANKCHARGE = 0
-- set V.FI11_BANKCHARGE = V.BANKCHARGES * FI11_BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC / V.TOTCURRC
-- set FI11_BANKCHARGEAMT = FI11_BANKCHARGEAMT + V.FI11_BANKCHARGE
-- set FI11_PMTAMT FI11_PMTAMT - V.FI11_BANKCHARGE
-- calculate sum of V.FI11_BANKCHARGE for the Step 3

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (FI11_BANKCHARGEAMT + FI11_DEDUCAMT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/FI11 where FI11_FM11_NO = :2 for fetch only
